title: Elmer's All Purpose School Glue Sticks, Washable, 7 Gram, 30 Count
description: Permanently bond items to paper, cardboard, foam board, display board, and more with Elmer's All Purpose Glue Sticks. Specially formulated to be easy to use and clean up, Elmer's washable glue sticks are perfect for arts, crafts, and school projects. Elmer's clear school glue apply smoothly and dry quickly, giving you reliable results with every use. They are washable, acid-free, photo safe, and non-toxic.
